meanings.definition: A period of time during which something takes place.
meanings.sent1: I read a book for a while before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: The children played outside for a while.
meanings.sent3: The cat napped for a while, then woke up to chase a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone brightly for a while, then disappeared behind the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The clock ticked away the while as I waited for my friend.

meanings.sent1: I sang while my friend played the guitar.
meanings.sent2: She cooked dinner while listening to music.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked while the mailman delivered the package.
meanings.sent4: The students studied while the teacher explained the lesson.
meanings.sent5: The birds chirped while the sun set in the horizon.

meanings.sent1: While it rained, we still had a great time at the picnic.
meanings.sent2: He went for a run while feeling a bit tired.
meanings.sent3: While it was cold outside, the fire kept us warm.
meanings.sent4: While she was young, she had a lot of responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: While the movie was long, it was very entertaining.
